title: Dark Tide
description: Targeted by a ruthless enemy and time is running out… Gina Evans knows her brother was murdered—even if the police won’t believe her. After catching a quick glimpse of the evidence her brother had gathered, the same criminals are after her and her baby niece. And Gina’s only hope is the man she once left behind, private investigator Derrick Justice. Trapped in a killer’s crosshairs, Derrick will stop at nothing to keep Gina and her niece safe. But can he trap the cold-blooded murderer before he strikes again?Previously publishedFamily and law enforcement go hand in hand in The Justice Agency. Don’t miss the rest of the series:Double ExposureDead WrongNo Way OutThread of Suspicion
author: Susan Sleeman
